Content.Text:
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now then, it's time to being making our
<RED>houses of candy</RED>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The project will be lead by <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Don't worry. As long as everyone works
together, you'll be able to make a grand
house of candy! Now let's begin!

You made a <BLUE>small house of candy</BLUE>!
This seems kind of small for a joint
effort...

You made a <BLUE>house of candy</BLUE>!
It's quite good. Well done!

You made a <BLUE>big house of candy</BLUE>!
It turned out great! It's a masterpiece!
Great job!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Your candy house is complete! Good
work, everyone.
<PAGE>
Now let's appreciate the fine work
that went into the house while chowing
down on some candy! Come get some.

I should go eat candy with <CHARANAME0>
this time around.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now then, it's time to being making our
<RED>houses of candy</RED>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh hi, <MYNAME>. Today is the Pumpkin
Festival, remember?
<PAGE>
On this occasion everyone joins together
to build a house made of candy. Would
you like to join?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh hi, <MYNAME>. Thanks for the candy.
<PAGE>
I was thinking of building a house made
of candy with everyone right now. Would
you like to join, too?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
All right! Now let's head on over to
the event square!

<FACE_HINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Here you go, <MYNAME>. Say "ah." I'll
give you some of my candy!
<PAGE>
You worked hard building that house of
candy. It's just my little way of
saying thank you.
<PAGE>
I had a lot of fun with you today,
<MYNAME>. Let's play again!

<FACE_TONI><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey, <MYNAME>.  This festival is
supposed to be for us, kids, right?
<PAGE>
So let's have fun together!
<PAGE>
I really like you, so I want to play
together, <MYNAME>! All right?! You
promise?

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Say, <MYNAME>. Thank you so much for
building the house of candy today.
<PAGE>
I want to thank you so come by my place
so I can give you some of the sweets
that I made!
<PAGE>
I'll prepare the best kind of sweets
that you would love, <MYNAME>! I hope
you'll look forward to it!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Say, <PARENT>. You really can do
anything, <PARENT>. You're amazing!
<PAGE>
When I grow up, I want to be just like
you, <PARENT>!
<PAGE>
Then I can help you with your work,
<PARENT>! I love you, <PARENT>!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Say, <PARENT>. You really can do
anything, <PARENT>. You're amazing!
<PAGE>
When I grow up, I want to be just like
you, <PARENT>!
<PAGE>
Then I can help you with your work,
<PARENT>! I love you, <PARENT>!

<FACE_SON><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Say, <PARENT>. We have the festival
with the house made of candy because
of you, <PARENT>, right?
<PAGE>
Thank you, <PARENT>! You're the best
in the world, <PARENT>!
<PAGE>
I'm so glad you're my <PARENT>!
Even if I were to be reborn I'd
still choose to be your son, <PARENT>!

<FACE_DAUGHTER><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Say, <PARENT>. We have the festival
with the house made of candy because
of you, <PARENT>, right?
<PAGE>
Thank you, <PARENT>! You're the best
in the world, <PARENT>!
<PAGE>
I'm so glad you're my <PARENT>!
Even if I were to be reborn I'd
still want to be your daughter <PARENT>!
